verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> In you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> do I put my <S%H2620>trust;<s%> let me <S%H408>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> <S%H6403>deliver<s%> me in your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

<S%H5186>Bow<s%> <S%H5186>down<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to me; <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me <S%H4120>speedily:<s%> be you my <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H6697>rock,<s%> for an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4686>defense<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> me.
For you are my <S%H5553>rock<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress;<s%> therefore for your <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> me, and <S%H5095>guide<s%> me.
<S%H3318>Pull<s%> me out of the <S%H7568>net<s%> that they have <S%H2934>laid<s%> <S%H2934>privately<s%> for me: for you are my <S%H4581>strength.<s%>
Into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> I <S%H6485>commit<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit:<s%> you have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H571>truth.<s%>
I have <S%H8130>hated<s%> them that <S%H8104>regard<s%> <S%H7723>lying<s%> <S%H1892>vanities:<s%> but I <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H2617>mercy:<s%> for you have <S%H7200>considered<s%> my <S%H6040>trouble;<s%> you have <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H6869>adversities;<s%>
And have not <S%H5462>shut<s%> me up into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy:<s%> you have <S%H5975>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in a <S%H4800>large<s%> <S%H4800>room.<s%>

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for I am in <S%H6887>trouble:<s%> my <S%H5869>eye<s%> is <S%H6244>consumed<s%> with <S%H3708>grief,<s%> yes, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> and my <S%H990>belly.<s%>

For my <S%H2416>life<s%> is <S%H3615>spent<s%> with <S%H3015>grief,<s%> and my <S%H8141>years<s%> with <S%H585>sighing:<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3782>fails<s%> because of my <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H6244>consumed.<s%>

I was a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6887>enemies,<s%> but <S%H3966>especially<s%> among my <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> and a <S%H6343>fear<s%> to my <S%H3045>acquaintance:<s%> they that did <S%H7200>see<s%> me <S%H2351>without<s%> <S%H5074>fled<s%> from me.
I am <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> as a <S%H4191>dead<s%> man out of <S%H3820>mind:<s%> I am like a <S%H6>broken<s%> <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>

For I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>slander<s%> of <S%H7227>many:<s%> <S%H4032>fear<s%> was on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side:<s%> while they took <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, they <S%H2161>devised<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> away my <S%H5315>life.<s%>
But I <S%H982>trusted<s%> in you, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> You are my <S%H430>God.<s%>
My <S%H6256>times<s%> are in your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and from them that <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me.
Make your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> on your <S%H5650>servant:<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me for your <S%H2617>mercies'<s%> sake.

Let me not be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for I have <S%H7121>called<s%> on you: let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> and let them be <S%H1826>silent<s%> in the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>

Let the <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> be put to <S%H481>silence;<s%> which <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6277>grievous<s%> things <S%H1346>proudly<s%> and <S%H937>contemptuously<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

Oh <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> is your <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6845>laid<s%> up for them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> you; which you have <S%H6466>worked<s%> for them that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in you <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>

You shall <S%H5641>hide<s%> them in the <S%H5643>secret<s%> of your <S%H6440>presence<s%> from the <S%H7407>pride<s%> of <S%H376>man:<s%> you shall keep them <S%H6845>secretly<s%> in a <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> from the <S%H7379>strife<s%> of <S%H3956>tongues.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for he has showed me his <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in a <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

For I <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H2648>haste,<s%> I am <S%H1629>cut<s%> off from <S%H5048>before<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H403>nevertheless<s%> you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%> when I <S%H7768>cried<s%> to you.

O <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you his <S%H2623>saints:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5341>preserves<s%> the <S%H539>faithful,<s%> and <S%H3499>plentifully<s%> <S%H7999>rewards<s%> the <S%H1346>proud<s%> <S%H6213>doer.<s%>
Be of good <S%H2388>courage,<s%> and he shall <S%H553>strengthen<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you that <S%H3176>hope<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
